author: ate
msg: Adapted Deploy tool now also supports stripping of loggers (commons-logging and/or log4j) jars as required for certain platforms like JBoss

author: ate
msg: Moved pamanager tools interfaces  to jetspeed-api to allow them to be used from external portlet applications.

author: ate
msg: Added stripLoggers factory parameter allowing commons-logging and log4j jars to be stripped from a war as can be required on

author: ate
msg: Made sure profiler rules are Serializable
